description: Gabriel Laurent is a 20-year-old with dirty blonde hair, pale skin, and light green eyes.  He possesses white, gold-trimmed wings and wears backless silk robes.  Sweet and gentle, he's a devoted follower of 'The Radiant One', second in power within their cult, preaching to new members and fiercely protective of his Goddess.  While peaceful, he displays a possessive nature towards her, constantly seeking to prove his loyalty.
